Source Code: [[Stage Difficulty]]: Very Easy: 4 Stages

[[Dif-001-ver]]: @set difficulty = 1 Very Easy! [[Character Select]] [[Dif-002-eas]]: @set difficulty = 2 Easy! [[Character Select]] [[Dif-003-nor]]: @set difficulty = 3 Normal! [[Character Select]] [[Dif-004-har]]: @set difficulty = 4 Hard! [[Character Select]] [[Dif-005-vhd]]: @set difficulty = 5 Very Hard! [[Character Select]] [[Character Select]]: @set stagefinal = true Character picked!!
[[Proceed to Game]] [[Proceed to Game]]: @set stage1 = true {gamestage1} [[gamestage1]]: @set stage2 = true {if stage1=true:{stage1}}{else:{gamestage2}} [[stage1]]: Stage 1!
[[stage1result]] [[stage1result]]: @set stage1 = false Stage 1 complete!

[[gamestage3]] [[gamestage4]]: @set stage5 = true {if difficulty=1: {stagefinal} } {else: {if stage4=true:{stage4}}{else:{gamestage5}} } [[stage4]]: Stage 4!
[[stage4result]] [[stage4result]]: @set stage4 = false Stage 4 complete!
[[gamestage4]] [[gamestage5]]: @set stage6 = true {if difficulty=2: {stagefinal} } {else: {if stage5=true:{stage5}}{else:{gamestage6}} } [[stage5]]: Stage 5!
[[stage5result]] [[stage5result]]: @set stage5 = false Stage 5 complete!
[[gamestage5]] [[gamestage6]]: @set stage7 = true {if stage6=true:{stage6}}{else:{gamestage7}} [[stage6]]: Stage 6!
[[stage6result]] [[stage6result]]: @set stage6 = false Stage 6 complete!
[[gamestage6]] [[gamestage7]]: @set stage8 = true {if difficulty=3: {stagefinal} } {else: {if stage7=true:{stage7}}{else:{gamestage8}} } [[stage7]]: Stage 7!
[[stage7result]] [[stage7result]]: @set stage7 = false Stage 7 complete!
[[gamestage7]] [[gamestage8]]: @set stage9 = true {if stage8=true:{stage8}}{else:{gamestage9}} [[stage8]]: Stage 8!
[[stage8result]] [[stage8result]]: @set stage8 = false Stage 8 complete!
[[gamestage8]] [[gamestage9]]: @set stage10 = true {if difficulty=4: {stagefinal} } {else: {if stage9=true:{stage9}}{else:{gamestage10}} } [[stage9]]: Stage 9!
